text: nabivarugen kopamana denek, ovun samanga allahge dÃ¦hÃ¦mi danangen yut boho denek samaga ekva (allahge margaye) satan karati. enamudu ovunata allahge margaye sidu vu duskarata venuven ovuhu adhairya novuha. tavada ovuhu durvala da novuha. emenma (saturanta) yatahat da novuha. tavada allah ivasilivantayin va priya karayi
